projects.credymas.title: CREDYMÁS
projects.credymas.product_description: Mortgage brokerage and financial services company in Málaga. Specialized in the processing and management of mortgage loans. We help you get the best mortgage on the market without complications or surprises, acting as your trusted mortgage advisor or broker.
projects.credymas.tech_reasons: It's my first serious project where I applied modern technologies. I chose Astro to build a highly optimized static website with excellent SEO. Posts are automatically synced every night through a GitHub Actions workflow that detects new posts and triggers a build, combining the best of both worlds: static performance and dynamic content.
